review: I am faced a major road accident where my both femur fractured.my parent contact to Dr Arunava Lala,my health condition was not good that time it was very serious and my oxygen level was very down.On his treatment ,operation and observation just only 6 week i can move both leg as very well,and can walking with support******* ** **** **** **** * *** *** ***now I am much better healing fast.
unhappy with Dr lala's scare mongering and pushy approach around my mother's knee pain. can't recommend.
